content: If anyone happens to be around and can kick in #281, then we should have our gallery submission workflow working again

https://cookbooks.projectpythia.org/_preview/103/ Could someone take a look at this preview and let me know if the gallery badges look correct? For me they aren't rendering, but for Brian they are.

See this PR: https://github.com/ProjectPythia/cookbook-gallery/pull/103

Julia Kent said:

https://cookbooks.projectpythia.org/_preview/103/ Could someone take a look at this preview and let me know if the gallery badges look correct? For me they aren't rendering, but for Brian they are.

See this PR: https://github.com/ProjectPythia/cookbook-gallery/pull/103

The preview link is giving me a 404 error. It looks like the github-actiosn bot deleted the preview for your PR. Is there another way to access it?
I see the same behavior as you on the published gallery @Julia Kent. Binder badges work on safari+macos and not chrome
